title: Leveling a smurf is so fucking painful
body:
You have two options.

0. Co-op, where all your teammates will be leveling scripts.
0. PvP, where all your teammates are smurfs whose mains got permabanned for inting/griefing and all your enemies are smurfs who got permabanned for toxicity.

New players leveling their main account will, of course, be limited to mostly the first option.

Side note: what are the actual penalties for leaving a game? Does it eventually result in real punishments that could put the account in jeopardy?
